rules_text:
Whenever Part-Time Shinigami deals combat damage to a player, you may exile a creature card from that player's graveyard. If you do, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
When Part-Time Shinigami dies, return it to the battlefield transformed.
rules_text2:
Haste
If a creature dealt damage by Yamaran Reaper this turn would die, instead exile it and create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
When Yamaran Reaper dies, return it to your hand.
